note:
Currently taking a few cat-nap breaks from social media. 😺💤
*purrrrrrrrrrrr 🧬🔬🧫🩺🏥🖥️🐧
Spent the last decade moving mostly water from little plastic tube to little plastic tube, reading very boring texts made up of only four letters with a special interest in only two of them. 🤭

Knows both ends of endotracheal tubes 🫁, so...
#keepmasksinhealthcare #maskup #diemaskebleibtauf #diemaskebleibtsowasvonauf

fields.name: Notice
fields.value:
Account contains unhealthy amounts of boosted cat, bird, squirrel and plant content to help me cope with work, life and the general ignorance all around.
Not here for followers.

fields.name: Profile picture
fields.value: Abstract wood sculpture of a black cat with yellow eyes. Design by Dominik Kirgus for TECTA, photo by me
